*@EUEnvironment European Pollutant Release and Transfer (E-PRTR) data is used in studies to assess the effectiveness of environmental policies addressing #industrialpollution, such as the #EU Industrial #Emissions Directive. 🏭🏭

Environmental #data at your fingertips – want to find out more about #industrialpollution near where you are? Check out the #European Pollutant Release and Transfer Register (E-PRTR) - https://t.co/JNSEzItCXh https://t.co/aqVfdWANDZ

*@MaranneGillis #Climatechange is not, by far, a main Environmental threat to Humanity.
#WaterCrisis, #Plastics, #IndustrialPollution, #SpeciesExtinction, and #Radioactivity are all vastly more important.
Climate Action will not save Our Kids and Grandkids.
